title: Certaine Englishe verses presented vnto the Queenes most excellent Maiestie, by a courtier: in ioy of the most happie disclosing, of the most dangerous conspiracies pretended by the late executed traitours, against her royall person, and the whole estate.
author: Lloyd, Lodowick, fl. 1573-1610.
publisher: Printed by [R. Ward for ] Henrie Haslop, and are to bee sold [by T. Cadman] in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Bible,
notes: Actual printer's name from STC; bookseller's name from STC addendum.
Running title reads: The triumphes of trophees in Saphic verse of iubilees.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
